title: To the metalheads here:
content:
I’m just getting into metal, I listen to nu-metal as of now and I think it’s awesome! I was thrilled and in awe when I saw one of the performances during this year's fresher's day and I’d love to connect with the metalheads here.

I’m also a total beginner and I am interested in learning heavy metal guitar, although I have no prior experience in playing any musical instrument.I’d really appreciate it if you guys could teach me some basic stuff be it guitar or drums.

comments.body: what kind of metal do you like?
Aluminium, Ferrous, sodium you name it I like it /s
heavy and nu metal. I started with linkin park and I now listen to slipknot, system of a down and more

That's perfect 
Try echo chamber, bad omens, bring me the horizon, korn, spiritbox, Thornhill
echo chamber is the metal band that performed for freshers thingy btw ;)
damn! I just listened to ultraviolet void and you guys have done really great. I hope you release new songs. I want you know more about you guys can I dm?

thank you so much :)
ofcourse, feel free to dm
